mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.OCCRRNC_DE , a.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS TRSMRCV_SE_CODE_NM , a.CNTC_ID , a.PROVD_INSTT_ID , a.PROVD_SYS_ID , a.PROVD_SVC_ID , a.REQUST_INSTT_ID , a.REQUST_SYS_ID , a.REQUST_TRNSMIT_TM , a.REQUST_RECPTN_TM , a.RSPNS_TRNSMIT_TM , a.RSPNS_RECPTN_TM , a.RESULT_CODE , a.RESULT_MSSAGE , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM008' AND a.REQUST_ID = #{requstId}

SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.OCCRRNC_DE , a.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS TRSMRCV_SE_CODE_NM , a.CNTC_ID , a.PROVD_INSTT_ID , a.PROVD_SYS_ID , a.PROVD_SVC_ID , a.REQUST_INSTT_ID , a.REQUST_SYS_ID , a.REQUST_TRNSMIT_TM , a.REQUST_RECPTN_TM , a.RSPNS_TRNSMIT_TM , a.RSPNS_RECPTN_TM , a.RESULT_CODE , a.RESULT_MSSAGE , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM008'
AND c.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND a.OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchBgnDe},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDe},'-','')
ORDER BY a.OCCRRNC_DE DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(a.REQUST_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM008'
AND c.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND a.OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchBgnDe},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDe},'-','')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTSTRSMRCVLOGSUMMARY SELECT b.OCCRRNC_DE , b.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , b.PROVD_INSTT_ID , b.PROVD_SYS_ID , b.PROVD_SVC_ID , b.REQUST_INSTT_ID , b.REQUST_SYS_ID , COUNT(b.OCCRRNC_DE) AS RDCNT , 0 AS ERROR_CO FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT c.OCCRRNC_DE FROM COMTSTRSMRCVLOGSUMMARY c WHERE c.OCCRRNC_DE = TO_CHAR(NOW() - interval '1 day', 'YYYYmmdd') ) AND b.OCCRRNC_DE = TO_CHAR(NOW() - interval '1 day', 'YYYYmmdd') GROUP BY b.OCCRRNC_DE , b.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , b.PROVD_INSTT_ID , b.PROVD_SYS_ID , b.PROVD_SVC_ID , b.REQUST_INSTT_ID , b.REQUST_SYS_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG WHERE OCCRRNC_DE < TO_CHAR(NOW() - interval '210 day', 'YYYYmmdd')
